attributes.additional_details:
Reason for rejection wrong and politically motivated
Cameron is a Friend of Israel
there is no other petition like this


Petition text:

That HM government should immediately condemn Operation Pillar of Cloud which resulted in over 140 Palestinian deaths and many injuries including the assassination of a senior government leader as well as deaths of Israelis.
Should also take immediate action to prevent any repetition of violence and any armed incursion into Gaza or any repetition of Operation Cast Lead, demand Israel abide by the ceasfire and end the long lasting illegal siege of Gaza which has caused untold death and suffering as well.

There is no other e-petition calling for this action

Frequently more than one e-petition about one subject are allowed

other e-petititons about Gaza because has been an issue since 1948

this e-petition addresses an immediate, new, specific and vital issue and calls for immediate action
